title: Accreditation platform
description: The implementation of an accreditation system played a crucial role in accrediting over 3500 participants from 54 African countries, significantly contributing to the success of the African Beach Games held in Hammamet. The participant registration process, spanning preliminary stages, long lists, short lists, arrivals, and departures, was meticulously executed. A pre-accreditation process, akin to obtaining a visa, was established for participants, ensuring a seamless entry experience. The system facilitated the generation of distinct printable badges for each participant based on their role. Additionally, it offered a comprehensive overview of all participants, equipped with export tools for efficient data management. This accreditation system not only streamlined participant logistics but also played a pivotal role in enhancing the overall organizational success of the event.
technologies: React , Express, Node JS, MongoDB, Digital Ocean, Websockets, JWT

title: Ecowarriors
description: The platform presents a gamified experience, introducing an innovative approach that seamlessly integrates social networks, gaming, and education, all while fostering environmental preservation and sustainable development. A module validates real-life quests completed by players, allowing the upload of videos or images as proof. The platform employs AI to generate avatars using the stable broadcast API. A dynamic system of experience points and rewards adapts based on the player's level, creating a personalized and evolving journey. Complementing this, a real-time chat module and notifications enhance user engagement. Furthermore, the platform introduces collectible cards, offering a tangible and rewarding aspect to the gaming experience. Players can level up, achieving milestone badges that unlock unique rewards, creating an immersive and motivating ecosystem for users.
technologies: React , Express, Node JS, MongoDB, Digital Ocean, Websockets, JWT

title: Online heaven platform
description: Online Heaven Platform represents a solution for the broadcasting of animated series, the sharing of publications, and the collection of information about video games. This platform is the answer to the needs of the community.
technologies: Laravel, Livewire Framework, RAWG api, Angular 8, Heroku web apps, Bootstrap 4

title: Mobile streaming app
description: This a school project, a mobile application accessible from devices under the Android operating system, mainly used for watching anime movies.

title: Spirit of life

This bespoke digital solution encapsulates a seamless blend of cutting-edge technology and purposeful design, empowering associations with a robust online presence and intuitive functionality.

title: BMI calculator
description: A personal project, mobile app coded with Dart and Fultter Framework, the purpose of this app is to calculate the body mass index of a person.
